comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Florence Lincoln (1897-1998, according to www.nytimes.com/1998/05/29/classified/paid-notice-deaths-...) She was a debutante in December 1915 (see The sun., December 26, 1915, THIRD SECTION, Page 3, with the same photo) and married William Avery Rockefeller II (August 8, 1896 – Oktober 14, 1973) in 1918 (The evening world., February 09, 1918, Final Edition, Page 10, with photo). Another photo of her: www.ebay.com/itm/1917-William-A-Rockefeller-Wife-Miss-Flo...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you B-59, for your research. We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
